headline: Nasdaq Announces the Board of Directors of its U.S. Exchanges
summary: NEW YORK, July 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Nasdaq, Inc. (Nasdaq: NDAQ) today announced the election of all nominated directors to the boards of the U.S. exchanges operated by the company, which include The Nasdaq Stock Market LLC, Nasdaq PHLX LLC, Nasdaq BX, Inc., Nasdaq ISE, LLC, Nasdaq MRX, LLC, and Nasdaq GEMX, LLC: Kathlyn Card Beckles, Chief Legal Officer, Verisk Analytics, Inc.Michael J. Curran, Retired Chairman and CEO, Boston Stock ExchangeAnne Marie Darling, Group Co-Chief Operating Of

content.title: Nasdaq Announces the Board of Directors of its U.S. Exchanges
